text: niyata vaśayenma kavurun apagē āyāvan boru kara ēvā pratikṣēpa kirīma āḍambarakamak vaśayen gattōda, ovunṭa (deviyangē varaprasādayanṭa himi) ahashi edāraṭu vivara karanu nolæbē. in̆dikaṭuvē sidura tuḷin oṭuveku riṁgana turu ovun svargaya at kara gannē næta. væradikaruvanṭa mē andamaṭama api phalavipāka dennemu
